assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors report no conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The study was approved by the research ethics board at St. Michael’s Hospital in Toronto, ON.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Consent was obtained from all interview participants. The landing page of the survey indicated that participant consent was implied by completion and submission of the survey.
